content: remaining 32 36 40 sts on needles pick up 1 st from the heel gusset pmm and pick up a second st from the gusset slip stitches as needed without knitting to return to mm 70 76 84 sts now on needles *k-tbl twice k30 34 38 sts k-tbl twice* twice you are twisting the 4 stitches picked up from the gusset along with the 2 stitches bordering each gusset i knit the stitches picked up from the round 1- k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before before the halfway point k2tog k2 ssk knit to 3 sts before mm k2tog k1 gusset and their round 2- knit all neighbors through the back loop to help repeat row 1 and 2 until 24 sts remain tighten the transition and avoid large holes break yarn leaving a tail approximately 15 long graft toe stitches closed with kitchener stitch finishing weave in all ends and block to finish thank you so much for downloading my first pattern feel free to tag me if you make a pair if you feel like seeing more knitting and what i m up to come join me on instagram read knit repeat regret written instructions for color work charts chart a row 25 *k1 with c1 k2 with c2 k3 with c1 k2 with c2* around row 1 *k4 with c2 k1 with c1 k3 with c2* row 26 *k2 with c1 k2 with c2 k1 with c1 around k2 with c2 k1 with c1* around row 2 *k3 with c2 k3 with c1 k2 with c2* row 27 *k1 with c1 k2 with c2 k3 with c1 around k2 with c2* around row 3 *k2 with c2 k5 with c1 k1 with c2* row 28 *k2 with c2 k5 with c1 k1 with c2* around around row 4 *k2 with c2 k5 with c1 k1 with c2* row 29 *k1 with c2 k7 with c1* around around row 30-31 knit all stitches with c1 row 5 *k1 with c2 k7 with c1* around row 32 *k4 with c1 k1 with c3 k3 with c1* row 6 knit all stitches with c1 around row 7 *k1 with c2 k7 with c1* around row 33 *k3 with c1 k3 with c3 k2 with c1* row 8 *k2 with c2 k5 with c1 k1 with c2* around around row 34 *k2 with c1 k5 with c3 k1 with c1* row 9 *k2 with c2 k5 with c1 k1 with c2* around around row 35 *k1 with c1 k7 with c3* around row 10 *k3 with c2 k3 with c1 k2 with c2* row 36-37 knit all stitches with c3 around row 38 *k4 with c3 k1 with c1 k3 with c3* row 11 *k4 with c2 k1 with c1 k3 with c2* around around row 39 *k3 with c3 k3 with c1 k2 with c3* row 12 knit all stitches with c2 around row 13-20 *k2 with c3 k2 with c1* around row 40 *k2 with c3 k5
